data.lyric:
[ti:Rich]
[ar:Maren Morris]
[al:Hero]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Rich (Radio Edit) - Maren Morris
[00:06.69]Written by：Maren Morris/Laura Veltz/Jessie Jo Dillon
[00:13.39]If I had a dollar every time that I swore you off
[00:18.21]
[00:19.41]And a twenty every time that I picked up when you called
[00:25.80]And a crisp new Benjamin for when you're here then gone again
[00:32.24]And a dollar every time I was right about you after all
[00:38.17]Boy I'd be rich head to toe Prada
[00:41.45]Benz in the driveway yacht in the water
[00:44.65]Vegas at the mandarin high roller gambling
[00:48.26]Me and Diddy dripping diamonds like Marilyn
[00:51.49]No I wouldn't be covered in all your IOU's
[00:54.94]Every promise you made me would have some real value
[00:58.19]Cause all the little lies rolling on your lips
[01:00.77]Is money falling from the sky sh*t I'd be rich
[01:05.88]
[01:10.75]I'd be rich
[01:11.99]
[01:17.41]If I had a dime every time that you crossed my mind
[01:22.29]
[01:23.33]Well I'd basically be sitting on a big a** pile of dimes
[01:28.12]And all the times that you make my heart feel cheap
[01:32.87]I might as well have won the lottery
[01:36.64]All of this pain and me cursing your name
[01:39.45]Would just turn into dollar signs
[01:42.21]Cause I'd be rich head to toe Prada
[01:45.43]Benz in the driveway yacht in the water
[01:48.64]Vegas at the mandarin high roller gambling
[01:52.24]Me and Diddy dripping diamonds like Marilyn
[01:55.42]No I wouldn't be covered in all your IOU's
[01:58.93]Every promise you made me would have some real value
[02:02.22]Cause all the little lies rolling on your lips
[02:04.92]Is money falling from the sky sh*t I'd be rich
[02:09.55]
[02:14.27]I'd be rich
[02:16.04]
[02:21.39]Told myself I wouldn't do this again
[02:24.23]But how much you wanna bet I'm do this again
[02:27.51]Cause I'd be rich head to toe Prada
[02:30.22]Benz in the driveway yacht in the water
[02:33.44]Vegas at the mandarin high roller gambling
[02:37.04]Me and Diddy dripping diamonds like Marilyn
[02:40.40]No I wouldn't be covered in all your IOU's
[02:43.43]Every promise you made me would have some real value
[02:47.06]Cause all the little lies rolling on your lips
[02:49.70]Is money falling from the sky sh*t I'd be rich
[02:54.40]
[02:59.11]I'd be rich
[03:00.84]
[03:05.72]I'd be rich
[03:07.39]
[03:12.06]I'd be rich
data.trans:
[ti:]
[ar:Maren Morris]
[al:Hero]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:06.69]//
[00:13.39]如果每放弃你一次 我都有一美元的收入
[00:18.21]
[00:19.41]每次当你给我打电话 我都有二十美元的收入
[00:25.80]当你陪在我身边 然后再次离开 本杰明都会在一直守候在我身边
[00:32.24]每次都有一美元的收入 毕竟我对你的判断没有错
[00:38.17]男孩 我会富裕无比 从头到脚都穿着普拉达
[00:41.45]开着奔驰豪车 坐着豪华游艇
[00:44.65]在拉斯维加斯过着奢靡生活 在赌场上肆意挥霍
[00:48.26]我的家人都打扮得珠光宝气 就像玛丽莲梦露
[00:51.49]我不会只有厚厚的借据
[00:54.94]你给我的每个承诺都有一些实际价值
[00:58.19]因为你满口谎话
[01:00.77]你说金钱都是唾手而得 那么我会富裕无比
[01:05.88]
[01:10.75]我会富裕无比
[01:11.99]
[01:17.41]如果我每想你一次 都能得到一枚硬币
[01:22.29]
[01:23.33]那我的硬币会堆积如山
[01:28.12]每一次 你都让我感到自卑惭愧
[01:32.87]我也许像中了头等彩票大奖一样
[01:36.64]所有的痛苦 所有对你的诅咒
[01:39.45]都变成美元符号
[01:42.21]因为我会富裕无比 从头到脚都穿着普拉达
[01:45.43]开着奔驰豪车 坐着豪华游艇
[01:48.64]在拉斯维加斯过着奢靡生活 肆意挥霍
[01:52.24]我的家人都打扮得珠光宝气 就像玛丽莲梦露
[01:55.42]我不会只有厚厚的借据
[01:58.93]你给我的每个承诺都有一些实际价值
[02:02.22]因为你满口谎话
[02:04.92]你说金钱都是唾手而得 那么我会富裕无比
[02:09.55]
[02:14.27]我会富裕无比
[02:16.04]
[02:21.39]告诉过自己 我不会再这样做了
[02:24.23]但是你会下多大的筹码 赌我会不会再次这样做
[02:27.51]因为我会富裕无比 从头到脚都穿着普拉达
[02:30.22]开着奔驰豪车 坐着豪华游艇
[02:33.44]在拉斯维加斯过着奢靡生活 肆意挥霍
[02:37.04]我的家人都打扮得珠光宝气
[02:40.40]我不会只有厚厚的借据
[02:43.43]你给我的每个承诺都有一些实际价值
[02:47.06]因为你满口谎话
[02:49.70]你说金钱都是唾手而得 那么我会富裕无比
[02:54.40]
[02:59.11]我会富裕无比
[03:00.84]
[03:05.72]我会富裕无比
[03:07.39]
[03:12.06]我会富裕无比
